Misc

I add random stuff to this page whenever I feel like it, for you to know more about me :)

  • Huge fan of Formula 1®, as well as other motorsports championships such as the GT series.

  • I speak Madarin, Cantonese, and English. I can read Japanese.

  • How to pronounce my name: similar to “zee”, “you” in English.

  • Vim > Emacs, can’t deny it eh :D

  • You can find a bunch of sky pictures on my Instagram, most of which are taken in the Beautiful British Columbia.

  • 3Blue1Brown is the key to succeed in math courses, no kidding.

  • I’ve recently started competing on Kaggle. Hope to get some medals in the future.

  • I don’t like stats as much as CS, but doesn’t mAcHiNe LeArNiNg sound way too cool?

  • My hobbies include playing chess, snowboarding, and reading. Please get in touch with me if you’re into these too!
